snippet.title: Ultimate Zombie Defense Trailer [HD]
snippet.description:
Team up or face it alone in this top down zombie slaying defense adventure! Featuring up to 4 player online co-op, cleanse the infected wave by wave and upgrade your base with traps & defenses to build the Ultimate Zombie Defense. 

Can YOU stop them?

Join in on the zombie slaying action as the game establishes itself through Steam's early access: 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1035510/Ultimate_Zombie_Defense/
